Migrate From Remark To MDX In Gatsby

description.text: Spearheaded Consumer-to-Business (C2B) Platform Development: Led end-to-end implementation of consumer-focused features, redesigned the user interface, and resolved critical bugs.

Developed Comprehensive Referral Flow: Created the full referral program flow, including landing pages, C2B dashboard integration with analytics, robust database architecture, and custom CLI scripts for rewards evaluation.
Integrated Klaviyo: Leveraged Klaviyo APIs and webhooks to automate consumer workflows, as well as transactional and marketing email processes.
Transitioned Reward Systems: Directed the shift from a dollar-based rewards system to a native Datacy Coin model, enhancing platform engagement.
Redesigned Website UI: Reimagined the Datacy website interface using Next.js, improving both aesthetics and user experience.
Enhanced Chrome Extension: Implemented consumer-focused features in the Datacy Chrome extension to boost functionality.
Upgraded Management Dashboard: Added key features to the internal management dashboard (built with Svelte and Python’s FastAPI) to better support team needs.
Crafted B2B Platform Features: Developed business-oriented functionalities on the B2B platform to meet corporate requirements.
Integrated Mixpanel: Enabled advanced analytics by integrating Mixpanel, supporting data-driven decision-making.
Contributed to the development of the
Polkadot and Kusama Crowdloan App UI.
Enhanced the Para and Heiko claim UI interface
Para and Heiko claim UI interface.
Played a pivotal role in crafting the UI for the
Automated Market Maker
, encompassing Swap and Liquidity Markets.
Pioneered the design and functionality of the
Parallel Money Market App UI.
Developed robust UI components for the Parallel Design System, showcased on Storybook.
Led the design efforts for Parallel Wallet's Chrome extension
Parallel Wallet's Chrome extension
, focusing on dashboard and transfer functionalities.
Integrated asset-importing capabilities from Ledger Wallet into the
Parallel Wallet Chrome extension.
Empowered the Parallel Wallet Chrome extension with transaction-signing functionality from Ledger Wallet.
Spearheaded the maintenance of the Coding Elements public website, crafted using Next.js.
Enhanced the Coding Elements Ops Platform (built in React.js) by introducing features such as a Class Scheduler, Certificate Generator, and Course Progress Tracker.
Managed the continuity and functionality of The Coding Elements E-Learning Platform, designed in React.js and integrated with Firebase services (functions, database, hosting, and authentication).
Successfully integrated the Coding Elements Python learning module with the Government of India's esteemed Atal Tinkering Labs Project.
Engineered APIs facilitating seamless integration of Coding Elements Learning Modules with external E-learning platforms.
Oversaw and managed the upkeep of the official website, redcarpetup.com.
Engineered a comprehensive funnel for card loss and claim procedures.
Designed a robust rewards program for the official RedCarpet app.
Seamlessly integrated Code Coverage tools into automation frameworks.
Crafted and optimized APIs using Python's Flask framework, ensuring enhanced feature implementation and peak performance.
Contributed to and maintained 'Primer', our proprietary ops platform, developed in React.js.
Strategically scoped, executed, and rolled out new features, as well as updates to core applications databases, and utilities.
Implemented an agile workflow, leveraging daily stand-ups and utilizing Trello for efficient task management.
Possess in-depth expertise with UI/UX styling frameworks such as Bootstrap, Foundation, and Semantic UI.
Expertly crafted web applications utilizing Meteor.js.
